# [Interview #1167: Lisbon, Portugal, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1167#6)

#### Moridin997

Did Bavadin in any way help Odium splinter Dominion and Devotion?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Uhh... Yes... Yes, you could say that...
